heading: HR00722
0: RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE STATE OF THE PHILIPPINE IT/COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION AND ITS IMPACTS ON THE PHILIPPINE SOFTWARE INDUSTRY AND, THUS, URGE THE COMMITTEES ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY, AND HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION, TO FORMULATE MEASURES TO IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF IT AND COMPUTER SCIENCE GRADUATES
